title: Michael Jordan, Patriots, dynasties, where Colin was right & wrong
itunes:title: Michael Jordan, Patriots, dynasties, where Colin was right & wrong
description:
Colin discusses how Michael Jordan was portrayed in The Last Dance documentary, the possibility of the Patriots moving up in the draft to get Tua Tagovailoa, why sports dynasties are a good thing, and where he was right and wrong. Guests include Doug Gottlieb, Ahmad Rashad, Mack Brown, and Matt Miller.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
